data.title: Lancaster University Leipzig
data.meta_description: Read more about why Germany is a great place to learn as an international student, and what Lancaster University Leipzig can offer you.
data.text:
Studying at Lancaster University Leipzig gives you the opportunity to study at a globally recognised British university on a bright and modern European campus.

All courses are taught in English, with German language courses offered to those who are interested. This allows students to improve their grasp on two of the most widely used languages in global industry.

By studying at Lancaster University Leipzig, youâ€™ll earn the same high-quality degree as students at the Lancaster University campus. You will also be part of a global community of students studying Lancaster University degrees across the globe.
